metaData.label: GP - PHARMA
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal General Medicine OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pharmacist Other

metaData.label: SP
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Pneumology OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Internal Medicine AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Pneumology ) OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Pneumology ) OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Geriatrics OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Internal Medicine AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Geriatrics ) OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Geriatrics )
